      The system checks if the team member is a responsible one If yes, it can not be removed If no, the system will unassign him from the requirement and the related tasks

      • unassignTeamMember

        public void unassignTeamMember​(TeamMember teamMember)
        The system checks if the team member is a responsible one If yes, it can not be removed If no, the system will unassign him from the requirement and the related tasks
        Parameters:
        teamMember - the team member which will be unassigned

      • assignResponsibleTeamMember

        public void assignResponsibleTeamMember​(TeamMember teamMember)
        The system unassigns first the responsible team member, then assigns the other one
        Parameters:
        teamMember - the team member which will be responsible

        estimatedTime - the new estimated time
        responsibleTeamMember - the new responsible member

        deadline - the new deadline

        priority - the new priority
